description: half length portrait turned left wearing armor and flat lace collar; with a moustache and beard; baton in left hand; right hand on sword; swagged curtain in background with battle scene to left; in oval with coat of arms upper left and wreath upper right
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image on sheet in black : IEAN Comte de Nassau Catzenelenboghe / Vianden Diest &c Chr de L\'Ordre du Toison D\'Or / B.Moncornet excu | on sheet in pencil: 2-83
portfolio: From Portraits after Van Dyck published by Moncornet
title: Portrait of Jean Comte de Nassau
